short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stop endlessly refreshing and snag a vaccine appointment on your own terms

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
FastVax NYC assists New York City residents (and commuters) with securing a first dose vaccination appointment. The extension actively monitors appointment availability and helps you secure an appointment at your ideal location and time.

Appointments must be booked through the NYC Vaccine Hub (vax4nyc.nyc.gov) which includes dozens of vaccine sites across all 5 boroughs.
